Bon jeu, l'adrénaline et le gameplay ne me lasse pas. Quelques mauvais points notamment avec les bugs qui persistent, pourtant le jeu date de presque un an, et certains gros bugs comme des pertes de sauvegardes irrécupérables. Mais en veillant à faire des backups régulièrement, très bon jeu, amusant et variant en fonction d'avec qui on joue.

В игре мегатонна багов, которые месяцами не фиксятся. Чтобы поиграть с друзьями надо нажать 100500 кнопок и то игра тебя 10 раз выкинет и нужно пересоздавать лобби, прежде чем ты наконец загрузишься к одному ливнувшему и остальным лагающим.
awful bugs
Jogo divertido, mas precisa melhorar tem muitos bugs...
For the amount of money I paid and the amount of hours I got out of the game I would say it's worth it

i like the game: it's loads of fun, can really create a lot of emotions, and risking everything to save a friend can be incredibly satisfying. that been said, one game, at least at lower levels, lasts on avarage between 5 and 15 minutes, depending how balanced the players are. that been said, the matchmaking is completely broken: had several games in which me and my GF (both noobs just starting out) were matched with people of much higher levels (rank 20 vs rank 1-5). there is no punishment for diconnecting (so if you are losing or sore about something, some people will just DC leaving you with one less survivor). there isn't, as far as i know, any punishment for trolls and cheaters (there is a report button at the end of the match, but i doubt it does anything: some were clearly cheating, seeing clearly tru walls, and checking on their accounts, in the last couple of days are still playing).
and, of course, if the killer (that is the host) lags, the game goes very much in favor of the killer, that can easily outrun a survivor humping a wall, so of course many killers abuse this.

the game is fun, and works pretty well, but there is a lot of trash in the community, especially lower levels.
at the moment i do not recomend, unless you have a full team of friends, a lot of time, patience, and literally no other coop game to play.


EDIT 12/08/2017: lots of bugfixes, the game solved a lot of the technical problems, but somehow the community has gotten worse. personally, i believe the matchmaking is complete crap, and instead of balancing the players, is more focused on creating a match quickly: results, always one or two complete noobs against someone with 4-5 hundred hours of gameplay.
micheal mayes太快了，受不了。。。。

Dead by Daylight is a good mulitiplayer horror game with no determined outcome of the match. Aside from the glitches, this is a really good game 2 play with ur friends.

Realmente es un juego que le he dedicado muchas horas y pienso dedicarle muchas mas, hasta cabe la posibilidad de que me llegue a comprar algun DLC. Pero no puede ser que este juego con la fama que esta obteniendo tenga los fallos que tiene, sobretodo en su unica manera de juego, el multijugador. Solo es una cosa la que proporciona, y no me creo que en su unica funcion, la de buscar partida ya de error... No sé, creo que os tendriais que replantear la manera en la que se ha desarrollado el juego online y intentar arreglar los servidores.
jó játék de fullig van buggal 30perc a lobbyban.... meg a kemper gyilkosok? nagyon kell neki egy hatalmas update!
Bon jeu

Balancing is ok if everyone is new to the game. Gets very killer favored once people know what they're doing. The objective of the game isn't even to survive/kill, it's just to farm as many points as you can. Lots and lots of bugs/connection issues. It should have much better quality for the popularity this game has. 

*Edit after another 800 hours* 
I didn't like the game in the beginning, and I like it even less now. I only play with friends since it's cross platform. I don't think it's fun, and it is rarely exciting. I think it's a wonderful idea for a game with poor execution. Bugs are worse now than they were before, to the point where sometimes the game isn't playable for days or even weeks (if you're playing on the switch then it's unplayable the majority of the time). If you wanna goof around and not take matches too seriously, then maybe it's possible to squeeze some enjoyment out of it. I don't recommend anyone to get into this game.

A ideia do jogo é boa, mas é puro bug, sai atualização mais nao vemos os erros sendo corrigidos !

10/10

Spiel ist gut aber lässt sich seit Monaten nicht mehr spielen. Lobby betreten oft unmöglich und Spiel bleibt beim Lobby suchen ständig hängen. Wenn man glück hat spielt man 20% und 80% wartet man auf die Lobby. Außerdem dauert das laden oft viel zu lange sodass die meisten Spieler das Spiel vor beginnen der Rude verlassen haben. Bei Ladezeiten von manchmal bis zu 10 Minuten ist das aber auch keinem zu verübeln. Ab 4-5 Minuten verlasse ich das Spiel mittlerweile auch.

I recommend this game for even those who don't love horror games.

Dead by Daylight while scary is not really just a horro game, but more of an action/teamwork sort of thing.

Pros:

Very fun gameplay 
Two different roles to play
Fun with friends
Ingame currency for upgrades which adds longevity

Cons:

Servers are pretty shit 
Crashes from time to time
Needs better skill based matchmaking (beginners may be matched against veterans)
Some stuff is unexplained
Bad team might lead to no fun

I give it a 6-7/10. Pretty fun.

Spiel ist recht amüsant. Mit Freunden macht es extrem viel Spaß. Online reicht es auch schon, wenn man zu zweit spielt. Das große Problem an Dead by Daylight ist, dass es für eine stable Version nicht ausreichend performant ist. Längere Ladebildschirme und mehrere, aber dafür sehr kleine, FPS-Drops trüben ein wenig den Spielspaß. Abgesehen von der performance fordert das Spiel bereits in der Warteschlange viel Geduld. Mehrere Minuten Wartezeiten sind üblich in DbD. Findet man mal eine Lobby tritt der wahrscheinliche Fall ein, dass man rausfliegt oder das der Host einfach nur kacke ist. DbD hat offensichtlich kaum bis gar nicht am Warteschlangensystem gearbeitet. Das System prüft nicht den ping des Spielers und würfelt die Spieler und deren Verbindungen hin und her. Eine Lobby die funktioniert findet man leider zu selten, als dass man darüber hinwegsehen kann. Und ja, leider kann ich dies bereits nach 7 Stundenspielzeit aussagen.

Dies ist der Grund meiner negativen Bewertung, weil ich ungern den Entwickler eine unterstützende Bewertung dalassen möchte. Bitte kauft euch das Spiel nicht und wartet bis die Entwickler an der Warteschlange arbeiten. Das Spiel ist leider nicht richtig spielbar.

Игра хорошая. В игре присутвуют много выживших и маньяков. Игра очень увлекательна, у каждого персонажа есть свои особые навыки. Вы играете за маньяка от первого лица ,что дает больше экшена,а за выжившего от третьего. Каждого персонажа можно переодеть по своему и даже купить дополнение где вам дадут еще пару красивых вещей. В игре присутвует большое количество карт что довольно таки радует. Целью игры является сбежать от маньяка если вы завели все генераторы (если вы играете за выжившего) , а если вы маньяк то вам нужно всех убить. Dead by Daylight - игра которая реально затягивает, в нее очень интересно играть, особенно с друзьями. 
Я советую вам купить игру и вы не пожалеете.
Удачи и спасибо что прочитали мой обзор!

After 3 years, I have finally gained both the specs and patience to play this game. For some reason, I was lured to it after beating Bloodborne and playing Dark Souls 3. I cannot explain the lure, the sensation and desire I felt for playing this game. So far, the community has been fairly nice, but I'm guessing in later ranks it's going to get pretty toxic, which I worry will spoil my enjoyment of the game. For the time being however, I enjoy playing matches both as survivor and killer, and have fun playing on both sides, despite how bad I am  sometimes. Once I had a game where 3 other survivors disconnected, and the Nurse I was against took me to the hatch, I was very thankful and it gave me hope for the playerbase. I hope one day, I too can enlighten people's days when they need it.

Plain and simply put. If a survivor exploits, the devs dont care. A killer exploits, instant permanent ban. Toxic behaviour is encouraged by devs. Not worth the buy unless you play with friends in a private lobby.

I want to like it, but the matchmaking kills the game in so many ways. The game just getting stuck searching (can't even quit), long wait times, the fact that it stops searching if it happens to fail joining a game, survivors failing to load after finally finding a game (leaving you with maybe 2 survivors), no skill level-based designation of who joins which game. I'd suspect that it were my end had I not done a big upgrade to the whole PC for VR.

As for the game itself, I'm not sure it's entirely sure what it should be. I've seen a lot of survivors with a sense of entitlement wherein everything that the killer does, from outright camping to playing strategically, is frowned upon. That the killer gets rewarded even for losing overall is good, but it feels like it reinforces the expectation that the killer play to entertain the survivors while also encouraging the killer to camp for maximum guaranteed points.
good game with a party of 4 friends
